model

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Rule>

    public class Rule
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Rule>
    This class is used to create a new rule, an new object is created when a new rule is defined or created.
    Author:
    Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen
    See Also:
